SocialMessage.NotFound: Accuse somebody who's not even there??
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You accuse yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n seems to have a bad conscience.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You beg the gods for mercy. (No way you're gonna get it! :-))
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: The gods fall down laughing at $n's request for mercy.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You desperately try to squeeze a few coins from $M.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n begs you for money. You gratiously let $m peep at your fortune.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n begs $N for a dime or two -- or twenty!
SocialMessage.NotFound: Your money-lender seems to be out for the moment.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: How? - begging yourself for money doesn't help.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You bleed profusely, making an awful mess...
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n bleeds profusely, making an awful mess...

SocialMessage.NotFound: Who's that?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You kiss your toes.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n folds up like a jacknife and kisses $s own toes.

SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n throws back $s head and cackles with insane glee!

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You clap your small hands together.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n shows $s approval by clapping $s small hands together.
$n combs $s hair, what a dashing specimen!
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You patiently untangle $N's hair -- what a mess!
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n pulls your hair in an attempt to comb it.
SocialMessage.NotFound: That person is not here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You pull your hair, but it will not be combed.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n tries to comb $s tangled hair.

SocialMessage.NotFound: Comfort who?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You make a vain attempt to comfort yourself.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Yuck, try to cover your mouth next time!

SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n cringes away from $N in mortal terror.
SocialMessage.NotFound: I don't see anyone by that name here.. what are you afraid of?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: I beg your pardon?

SocialMessage.NotFound: Who's that?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You cry to yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n sobs quietly to $mself.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Who do you feel like cuddling today?
SocialMessage.NotFound: You must feel very cuddly indeed. :)

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You swear loudly for a long time.

SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n tries to dance breakdance but nearly breaks $s neck!
SocialMessage.NotFound: Eh, WHO?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You skip and dance around by yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n skips a light Fandango.

SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n looks absent-minded, $s eyes staring into space.

SocialMessage.NotFound: Pardon??
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Sure, go ahead and drool...yuk!
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n drools on $mself. What a sight.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You reach but come away empty. :(
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n reaches out for an embrace, but no one is there.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Alas, your embracee is not here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You embrace yourself??
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n wraps his arms around himself for a warm self-embrace.

SocialMessage.NotFound: Sorry, your dearly beloved is not around.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You flirt with yourself. Must look stupid.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n thinks $e is the most wonderful person in the world.

SocialMessage.NotFound: You fondly try to fondle someone not in the room, but who cares.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You fondly fondle yourself, feels funny doesn't it?
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n fondly fondles $mself -- this is going too far!!

SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You give $N a long and passionate kiss, it seems to take forever...
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n gives you a long and passionate kiss, it seems to take forever...
SocialMessage.NotFound: Your heart is filled with despair as that person is not here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You gather yourself in your arms and try to kiss yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n makes an attempt at kissing $mself.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Take it easy now! Count to ten, very slowly.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n grits $s teeth and fumes with rage.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n stares at you, fuming with rage!
SocialMessage.NotFound: Fume away.. they ain't here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: That's right - hate yourself!
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n clenches $s fists and stomps his feet, fuming with anger.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You glare at nothing in particular.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n glares icily at you, you feel cold to your bones.
SocialMessage.NotFound: You try to glare at somebody who is not present.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You glare icily at your feet, they are suddenly very cold.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n glares at $s feet, what is bothering $m?

SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You greet $m with a light kiss on his cheek.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n greets $N with a light kiss on its cheek.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n greets you with a light kiss on your cheek.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Please -- try someone who is here?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: So, you've finally discovered yourself!
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n greets $mself.. $e always was a strange one.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Whom do you wish to grope??
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: Well, what sort of noise do you expect here?
SocialMessage.NotFound: Try someone who's here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You grope yourself -- YUCK.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n gropes $mself -- YUCK.

SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n grovels in the dirt before you.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Who?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: That seems a little silly to me..

SocialMessage.NotFound: Sorry, friend, I can't see that person here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You hug yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n hugs $mself.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Isn't there someone you want to kiss?
SocialMessage.NotFound: Never around when required.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: All the lonely people :(

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You lick your mouth and smile.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Lick away, nobody's here with that name.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You lick yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n licks $mself -- YUCK.

SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You tell your true feelings to $N.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n whispers to you sweet words of love.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Alas, your love is not present...
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Well, we already know you love yourself (lucky someone does!)
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n loves $mself, can you believe it?

SocialMessage.NotFound: You can only massage someone in the same room as you.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You practise yoga as you try to massage yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n gives a show on yoga-positions, trying to massage $mself.

SocialMessage.NotFound: Sorry, not here, better go back to dreaming about it.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You nibble on your OWN ear???????????????????
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n nibbles on $s OWN ear (I wonder how it is done!!).

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Nudge? Nudge??? The HELL you say!!!!
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n nudges you suggestively. You two have an understanding.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Eh? That person isn't here, you know.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Well, just nudge yourself, but how do you get your elbow in that position?
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n nudges $mself with $s elbows, making $m look like a large chicken.

SocialMessage.NotFound: No.. they aren't here..
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: I'm sorry, friend, but that's impossible.

SocialMessage.NotFound: Who, where, what??
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You pat yourself on your head, very reassuring.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n pats $mself on the head.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You peer around you, uncertain that what you see is actually true.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n peers around, looking as if $e has trouble seeing everything clearly.
$n points in all directions, seemingly confused.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You point at $M -- $E DOES look funny.
SocialMessage.NotFound: You must have a VERY long index-finger...
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You point at yourself. Insinuating something?
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n points at $mself, suggesting that the center of matters is $e.

SocialMessage.NotFound: You can't poke someone who's not here!
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You poke yourself in the ribs, feeling very silly.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n pokes $mself in the ribs, looking very sheepish.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You ponder over matters as they appear to you at this moment.
Ah, don't take it so hard.
You feel righteous, and maybe a little foolish.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n begs and grovels to the powers that be.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You crawl in the dust before $M.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n falls down and grovels in the dirt before $N.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n kisses the dirt at your feet.
SocialMessage.NotFound: No such person around; your prayers vanish into the endless voids.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Talk about narcissism...
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n performs some strange yoga-exercises and mumbles a prayer to $mself.

SocialMessage.NotFound: Once again?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You puke on yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n pukes on $s clothes.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Punch the air? Sure, go ahead, fine by me...
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You punch $M right in the face! Yuck, the BLOOD!
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n punches weakly at $N, missing by miles.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n tries a punch at you but misses by a good quarter-mile...
SocialMessage.NotFound: Punch who?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You punch yourself in the face resulting in your own nose being bloodied.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n punches $mself in the face, looking kind of stupid.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You roll your eyes in disgust.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You look at $M and roll your eyes in disgust.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n looks at $N in contempt and rolls $s eyes with disgust.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n stares at you and rolls $s eyes in digust.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Um... who?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You roll your eyes, disgusted with your own incompetence.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n rolls $s eyes, disgusted with $mself.

SocialMessage.NotFound: Might be a bit difficult.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You ruffle your hair, wondering how far you can go before the rest think you're crazy.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n ruffles $s hair -- weirdo!

SocialMessage.NotFound: Sorry good buddy, but that person doesn't seem to be here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You are shaken by yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n shakes and quivers like a bowlful of jelly.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You raise your clear (?) voice towards the sky.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: SEEK SHELTER AT ONCE! $n has begun to sing.

SocialMessage.NotFound: How about slapping someone in the same room as you??
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You slap yourself, silly you.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n slaps $mself, really strange...

SocialMessage.NotFound: There's no one by that name around.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You smile at yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n smiles at $mself.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You snarl like a viscious animal.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n snarls like a cornered, viscious animal.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You snarl at $M angrily. Control yourself!
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n snarls angrily at $N. $e$u seems incapable of controlling $mself.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n snarls viciously at you. $U$s self-control seems to have gone bananas.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Eh? Who? Not here, my friend.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You snarl at yourself, obviously suffering from schizophrenia.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n snarls at $mself, and suddenly looks very frightened.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Who do you want to throw a snowball at??
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You throw a snowball in $N's face.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n conjures a snowball from thin air and throws it at $N.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n conjures a snowball from thin air and throws it at you.
SocialMessage.NotFound: You stand with the snowball in your hand because your victim is not here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You conjure a snowball from thin air and throw it at yourself.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n conjures a snowball out of the thin air and throws it at $mself.

SocialMessage.NotFound: They aren't here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Hmmm...

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You spank WHO? Eh? How? Naaah, you'd never.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n spanks the thin air with a flat hand.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You spank $M vigorously, long and hard. Your hand hurts.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n spanks $N over $s knee. It hurts to even watch.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n spanks you long and hard. You feel like a naughty child.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Are you sure about this? I mean, that person isn't even here!
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Hmm, not likely.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You spit over your left shoulder.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Can you spit that far?
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You drool down your front.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n drools down $s front.

SocialMessage.NotFound: Where, what, how, WHO???
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You squeeze yourself -- try to relax a little!
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n squeezes $mself.

SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You stare dreamily at $N, completely lost in $S eyes..
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n stares dreamily at you, completely lost in your eyes.
SocialMessage.NotFound: You stare and stare but can't see that person anywhere...
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You stare dreamily at yourself - enough narcissism for now.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n stares dreamily at $mself - NARCISSIST!

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You let out some steam, much to the others' relief (and your own!)
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n lets out a lot of steam, much to your relief.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Whose thigh would you like to stroke?
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n gently strokes your inner thigh with feathery touches.
SocialMessage.NotFound: That person is not within reach.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You are about to do something you would rather not be caught doing.
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n starts to do something disgusting and then stops.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You tackle the air. It stands not a chance.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n starts running around $mself in a desparate attempt to tackle the air.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You ruthlessly tackle $M to the ground.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n ruthlessly tackles $N, pinning $M to the ground.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n suddenly lunges at you and tackles you to the ground!
SocialMessage.NotFound: That person isn't here (luck for them, it would seem...)
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Tackle yourself? Yeah, right....
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n makes a dextrous move and kicks $s left leg away with $s right.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: With whom would you like to tango?
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n puts a rose between $s teeth, but takes out it since noone joins $m.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You put a rose between your teeth and tango with $M seductively.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n puts a rose between $s teeth and tangos with $N seductively.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n puts a rose between $s teeth and tangos with you seductively.
SocialMessage.NotFound: That person isn't around. Better sit this one out.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Feels rather stupid, doesn't it?
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n puts a rose between $s teeth and tries to tango with $mself.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You taunt the nothing in front of you.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n taunts something that seems to be right in front of $m.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You taunt $M, to your own delight.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n taunts $N rather insultingly. $U$n seems to enjoy it tremendously.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n taunts you. It really hurts your feelings.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Hmmmmmmm.....nope, no one by that name here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You taunt yourself, almost making you cry...:(
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n taunts $mself to tears.

SocialMessage.NotFound: No one answers to that name here.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You thank yourself since nobody else wants to!
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n thanks $mself since you won't.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You think about life, the universe and everything.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n sinks deeply into thought about the meaning of life.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You think about what purpose $E has in relation to your part of life.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n stops and thinks about $N, completely lost in thought.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: Your ears burn as $n thinks about you.. you wonder what about.
SocialMessage.NotFound: You'd better think harder, if you hope to make contact!
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You think about yourself (for once).
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n thinks about $mself for a change.....(?)

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Who do you want to tickle??
SocialMessage.NotFound: Who is that??
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You tickle yourself, how funny!
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n tickles $mself.

SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n waves goodbye to you. Have a good journey.
SocialMessage.NotFound: They didn't wait for you to wave goodbye.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: Are you going on adventures as well??
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n waves goodbye to $mself.

SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n whines pitifully about the whole situation.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Have you got something in your eye?
SocialMessage.NotFound: No one with that name is present.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You wink at yourself?? -- what are you up to?
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n winks at $mself -- something strange is going on...

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: You find yourself head-down in the dirt, worshipping.
SocialMessage.CharacterFound: You fall to your knees and worship $M deeply.
SocialMessage.OthersFound: $n falls to $s knees, worshipping $N with uncanny dedication.
SocialMessage.VictimFound: $n kneels before you in solemn worship.
SocialMessage.NotFound: Uh.. who? They're not here, pal.
SocialMessage.CharacterAuto: You seem sure to have found a true deity.....
SocialMessage.OthersAuto: $n falls to $s knees and humbly worships $mself.

SocialMessage.CharacterNoArg: Gosh, will you trade those teeth for mine?? -- you get my glasseyes in the bargain too!
You start yodelling loudly and rather beautifully in your own ears.
SocialMessage.OthersNoArg: $n starts a yodelling session that goes right to the bone.
